post.description: This endpoint generates a One-Time Password (OTP) and sends it to either the specified email address or phone number, depending on the criteria provided. If the criteria is 'EMAIL', an OTP will be sent to the specified email address, and phone numbers are not allowed. If the criteria is 'PHONE', an OTP will be sent to the specified phone number, and email addresses are not allowed.

value.message: Criteria is mandatory and must be either EMAIL or PHONE.
Phone is mandatory when criteria is PHONE
Invalid type it should be one of the following SIGN_UP_OTP | FORGET_PASSWORD_OTP.

post.description: This endpoint verifies the OTP provided by the user for either signup or password recovery. Based on the criteria ('EMAIL' or 'PHONE'), it will verify the OTP sent to the specified email address or phone number. If the OTP is valid, the process continues. If invalid, an error message is returned.

otp.description: The OTP that the user received.

example.message: session expired or not exists yet.

post.description: Submits the user profile details, including first name, last name, date of birth, and password, after verifying the user's session.

dob.description: The user's date of birth in 'DD-MM-YYYY' format.

contactEmail.description: The user's contact email for furture making contact.

password.description: The user's password (8-15 characters, including an uppercase letter, lowercase letter, number, and special character).

400.description: Validation error in the submitted profile data

errors.msg: Password must be 8-15 characters, including an uppercase letter, lowercase letter, number, and special character

403.description: No token found in cookies or invalid session

post.description: This api just required a cookie that is been set by server make sure always include credentials

loginKey.description: login key can either be phone or email.

patch.description: Changes the user's password after verifying the user's session token and validating the new password.

password.description: The new password for the user (8-15 characters, including uppercase, lowercase, number, and special characters).

401.description: Account does not exist or session expired

example.message: Looks like you do not have account with us. kindly register.

500.description: Internal server error while changing password

post.description: Converts a guest user to a host user. Simply hit this API endpoint after successful login to upgrade user privileges from guest to host status.
Add property to user's wishlist for future reference and easy access.

get.description: Add property to user's wishlist for future reference and easy access.
